title: Can't Log In to Ask Riot or To Comment something on posts
body:
So I've been wanting to comment on a few of riot's posts over the past 2 weeks with no luck. It keeps asking me to login even though I already am, then just re-directs me back to the page. It's also not working when I want to go to the "Ask Riot" page. Same thing happens. 
Any ideas?

replies.body: Your browser may be clogged up so to speak, and needs a little spring cleaning.  I suggest cleaning your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to make sure everything on your end is up to date.  You can also use anotehr browser or Incognito to see if that helps.  Finally, when you leave the boards to comment in those sections, check the top right of the page to make sure you have the correct region selected.  I hope that helps!
